name: Wicked Wilds
description:
Wicked Wilds is a game about keeping a fire alive. To do this, you’ll have to scavenge an island for ressources, craft tools and prepare yourself - for the looming threats that come at night.

Figuring out what you can do to keep your fire ablaze and your candleman healthy is part of the fun - don’t go in expecting to understand everything right away; we don’t expect you to either. We would absolutely love to hear your thoughts on the game and how long you survived!
